Plot: The world is beset by the appearance of monstrous creatures, but one of them may be the only one who can save humanity.
Title: Godzilla
Actors: Aaron Taylor-Johnson, CJ Adams, Ken Watanabe, Bryan Cranston
tomatoConsensus: With just enough human drama to anchor the sweeping spectacle of giant monsters smashing everything in sight, Gareth Edwards' Godzilla satisfyingly restores the franchise's fire-breathing glory.
